Title: Mother of the Bride with Jeweled Accent

Colors: black, rose, royal, jade

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CF063-royal-mother-of-the-bride-with-jeweled-accent_p.jpg

----

Description: This mother of the bride gown is elegant and ready to be shown off. The scooped neckline is sheer and is overlaid on a sweetheart top. There is a light ruching at the waistline where a sparkling broche is attached at the side. The 3/4 length sleeves are sheer and the skirt flows to the floor. Any mother would look fabulous in this gown.
